messages.message: Hi all, i’m having stability issues with the platform this morning, page loads are very slow, and then i’m also getting 504 errors
same here - took 3 minutes to create a folder in a directory as well
And running flows is not happening for me, any execution ends in being timed out and nothing is logged on the Flow Dashboard
Recycled file services, can you pls try your refiner and flow programs are working now?
Flow execution is working now thanks
Thanks, this was back to normal earlier, but i’m now having the same issues again.
yup, I just saw the same issue on a customer call.. can we fix this?

I don't see a lot of 504s overall: https://instabase.com/grafana/d/ZQAsi-Xizz/nginx-dashboard?orgId=1&refresh=30s

Sounds like there are a number of different issues -- is the main one that pages are 504ing or the file service latency? The file service one is due to memory build up in the file service v2 pods, we'll have to manually restart them for now as a workaround.
I haven’t seen a 504 yet. But unable to load any files or apps
hey @kunal, If a file operation fails in webserver, do we send 5xx or 2xx?
not sure -- my guess is it's different for every api/page. If someone can share the specific page that is giving a 504, I can look into the code.

Just want to double check these are all problems in our prod env right? @Bren when you said you saw this on a customer call was that also on our prod? Your issues would likely be a different one otherwise
@Heymian, correct: it was with ib.com (http://ib.com) in the context of a demo with a customer.
Got it, that makes sense then
